DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine whether transarterial chemoembolization containing arsenic trioxide is safe and effective in the treatment of intermediate-stage hepatocellular carcinoma.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Arsenic Trioxide Contained in TACE in the Treatment of HCC
